item.title: Anime - Tidy Tuesday
item.description: For a first blog post, I thought to jump into a great online community called #TidyTuesday and add my own small contribution to the weekly event. I must say that a quick search of the Twitter hashtag does leave you feeling quite inspired! Not much of an #anime guy, but this week's #TidyTuesday data suggests that, at least according to fans, we may be living in a golden age for the art.
